Hi! I'm new and for the next four days I'll be introducing my chars.


"Hey Stoonbot, isn't this great?"

Ranbis and Stoonbot are two Decepticons fighting in the very first war of 
the auto-bots and the decepticons. But for one of them, life is about to 
change.....

"Watch me toats this Auto-bot!" said Stoonbot as he fired 2 missle right at 
a helpless AB, "Now you try."

Ranbis jumped into the air and was ready to frie at the auto-bot, but 
suddenly more of them arrived and they sent Ranbis sprawling. Stoonbot took 
to the skys, and Ranbis went underground.

"Whoo! Sure is dark over here. I'll walk a bit further."

After a bit of walking, he found the doors to a great chamber. It took all 
his might, but he pushed them open. And their, standing before him, was The 
Matrix.

"I thought it was just a legend...."

Ranbis moved closer.... and reached out to touch it. As soon as he did, he 
found himself whirling around inside it with many destroyed Auto-bots. All 
of them were deciding how to punsih him. Than the ones that him and Stoonbot 
just destroyed came forward.

"On the other side of the galaxy, there is a war with more sophisticated 
bots from the future. Let's watch him fight there, in unknown terriotry with 
advanced technology. Let's see how he handles there."

So it was decided. He was too be sent to the Neo beast Wars. In an instant 
Ranbis found himself on a strange looking planet, with animlas and organic 
things he had never seen before. After awhile of walking, all the energon 
exposure was getting too him, and he was at risk of losing his spark. Just 
than though, he spotted some type of pod. It seemed that it was too much 
technology for such a primitive planet. He hoped into it, hoping it would 
protect him. It closed shut on him, and a voice began speaking.

"DNA Scanning beggining"

Ranbis felt weird changes, as his body was becoming complelty new. Then, he 
began to realize what was going on as Ranbis the Decpticon became only 
memoires and a new more powerful bot was formed. When it was done, the new 
bot hoped out and checked himself out. Large wings. A red neck. He was in 
the form of one of these animals on this planet. Than, everything was 
revealed.

"I...I understand. No longer am I a primitive decepticon. I am an advanced 
descendant of them, called the Predacons. I have merged robotics with 
organic material to create a stronger bot. No, the sparks in the matrix did 
not suspect this. They thought I would die a cowards death. But now I get to 
fight in an even bigger war. I AM VULIOS THE VULTURE! A predacon, 
through-and-through."

The newst Predacon spread his wings for the first time and took off to find 
more of his kind.
